20200.name: {RE{rntrance to the {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr{x
description: {RThe entrance to the hangar is barred by a huge gate.  Standing at
operation of the gate is a large fiery golem, ready to swing the
seemingly unmovable gates open at command of a proper authority.  {x {RA
large sign stands here, explaining the procedure to open the gates to
the north and the way back to the Polaris airship port lies south.  {x
A large airship gate.

20226.name: {RL{reader {rO{Rf{Yfi{Rc{re{x
description: {rThe room teems with energy.  There is an {Runusual heat in the air.
It does {Ynot feel to be a normal type of {rwarmth, but coming from
{Rsomewhere unusual.  There is a {Ylarge desk in the distant middle of the
room.  {r There are a few sofas and chairs {Rstrung about, for those with
official {Ybusiness.  {x

20230.name: {BP{Wol{Ca{Wri{Bs {RT{Yo{rw{yn {rO{Rf{Yfi{Rc{re{x
description: {bA{Bside from a{wn odd chill in th{Ce roo{wm like someone left {Ba windo{bw
o{Bpen, there is{w only a large cou{Cnter {wagainst the far wall {Bof the roo{bm.
A {Bsmall bell wi{wth a broken ring{Cer a{wnd a sign are set on {Bthe counte{br.  {x

20222.name: {rH{Ra{Yllw{Ra{ry{x
description: {RThis flaming hot hallway of the second floor leads to the Polaris
Town Office to the east and the staff recruitment office to the west.
Back north is the staircase.  {x

20202.name: {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr {RI{rntersection{x
description: {RThe room is huge, big enough to fit more than one airship.  Exits
on this level branch to the hangars to the north, west and east.  The
exit is south and a staircase leads to the offices on the second
floor.  {x
{YWest: Hangars 1 and 2 {B|{Y North: Hangar 3 {B|{Y East: Hangars 4 and 5{Y

20204.name: {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr {BWay{x
description: {YNorth: Hangar 1 {B|{Y East: Hangars 2, 3, 4 and 5{Y

20214.name: {rH{Ra{Yllw{Ra{ry{x
description: {RThe hot and flaming hallway ends here.  The ladies' lavatory lies
south and gentlement can relieve themselves to the north.  The rest of
the facilities lies to the west.  {x

20231.name: {RT{ro{Yw{re{Rr {RT{Yo{rp{x
description: {rYou stand in a large {rstone circle.  Flowing below you is a sea of
{Rfiery magma underneath, what appears to be, a sheet of pure {Rdiamond.
{YCentered here, is a flowing stone altar.  It appears to be made of
{ylava, Yet it is cool to the touch.  The pillars around you reach high
{Yinto the air, with little flames dancing in the pools of lava at the
{Rtop.  As you watch the molten rock below your feet, you notice several
{rsolid points, which seem to be supporting the structure.  {x

20220.name: {rH{Ra{Yllw{Ra{ry{x
description: {RThis is the center of the second floor of the tower.  The hallway
branches to the north and south, bringing the visitors and workers to
the facilities of the town hall.  The staircase continues upwards to
the higher levels of the tower, where only members of the faction may
go.  A few windows offer a nice view of the city of Polaris.  {x
{CInfernally cold Polaris shows itself when you look out the window...
You shiver slightly at the thought of what's it like out there compared
to the heat in the town hall.
{x

20232.name: {rG{Ra{Ytheri{Rn{rg {rP{Rl{Ya{Rc{re{x
description: {RHere is a beautiful, grand room.  Made for a hundred people or
more.  A large staircase leads farther up, into the tower.  While the
exit to the town is to the south.  There are a few people bustling
around here, looking for thier places in a fast-paced life.  Here and
there are a few chairs and stray tables, for the weary that wish to do
nothing more then rest.  {w

20215.name: {rS{Rt{Yairca{Rs{re{x
description: {RThe walls themselves seem to emmit heat as one ventures deeper into
the tower.  Mysteriously shaped flames visualize all around as if they
were hallucinations.  It seems to get hotter closer to the staircase
that leads upwards.  Cooler Polaris air still finds it's way in from
the southern direction.  {x

20224.name: {rS{Rt{Yairca{Rs{re{x
description: {RThis is the staircase of the third floor of the tower.  There are
offices to the east and west, whereas only members of the faction may
enter.  The {YTemple of {rK{Ro{Yssu{Rt{rh{R is at the top of the tower.  {x

20201.name: {RE{rntrance to the {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr{x
description: {RThe exit from the hangar is barred by a huge gate. Standing at
operation of the gate is a large fiery golem, ready to swing the
seemingly unmovable gates open at command of a proper authority. A
large sign stands here, explaining the procedure to open the gates to
the south and the Flame Air Ordinance hangar is back north.{x
A large airship gate.

20234.name: {RP{ret{Ys{rho{Rp{X
description: {RBeautifully carved doorways and edgin{Yg {Ymark this place as part of
{rthe Flame HeadQuarters.  There is /one/{y thing that sets it apart from
{Rthe rest of the place, and that is the {Ymess laying all around.  There
{rare cages everywhere...  Open, closed, {ybroken...  Just everywhere.  An
{Ramazing woman stands in the middle of t{Yhe room, playing with the loose
{ranimals.  It smells alot like a wet cho{ycobo in this place,
{X

20218.name: {rL{Ra{Yvato{Rr{ry {B(Gentlemen){x
description: {BShining brightly in the light, the marble toilet gleams in the
florescent lights of this lavatory.  The walls are a soft blue and the
floor, a blue marbled tile.  Across to the left is a large sink for
handwashing.  To the close right is the toilet stalls, for any other
'business'.  {X

20221.name: {rH{Ra{Yllw{Ra{ry{x
description: {RThis is the north end of the second floor of the tower, the hallway
ends here, the Cafeteria to the east and the Bank to the west.  There
is a staircase here, spiraling downward to the lower, more accessable,
parts of the tower.  {x

20225.name: {rC{Ro{Ynferen{Rc{re {RR{room{x
description: {rThis room is oddly shaped and {Rtapers from the walls to the center.
It has multiple {Ytiers lined with chairs and {rdesks.  There is a {rbalcony
set into the far wall, {Rfor the seat of the elders.  There are many
{Ychairs here, for many ears.  A {rlarge desk is resting in the pit of {Rthe
room covered, almost {Ycompletely, in papers and memories.  {x

20216.name: {rL{Ro{Yun{Rg{re{x
description: {RPeacefully relaxing flames dance illusively on the walls, pleasing
the eye.  A comfortable sofa stands here, ready to offer rest for
those tired of office work and airship piloting alike.  The exit from
this room to the rest of the facilities lies to the north.  {x

20205.name: {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr {BWay{x
description: {YWest: Hangars 1, 2 and 3 {B|{Y North: Hangar 4 {B|{Y East: Hangar 5{Y

20229.name: {RR{recruitment {rO{Rf{Yfi{Rc{re{x
description: {rThe walls are a warm tone of {Rorange and seem the most simple of the
{Yarea.  There is a long table here, surrounded by {rsturdy yet small
chairs.  {RBooks and a large map are embedded {Yinto the far end of the
table.  There{r is a short clipboard with a sign-in {Rsheet hanging to the
left of the door.  {x

20203.name: {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr {BWay{x
description: {YWest: Hangar 1 {B|{Y North: Hangar 2 {B|{Y East: Hangars 3, 4 and 5{Y

20217.name: {rH{Ra{Yllw{Ra{ry{x
description: {RThe walls of the hallway emmit great heat and illusive images of
burning flames on them blur your mind...  {x {RThe lavatories are to the
west, a staircase leads down to the hangars and the exit and the
office is to the west.  {x

20219.name: {rL{Ra{Yvato{Rr{ry {M(Ladies){x
description: {MLilacs and honeysuckle freshen the air, as the gold framed mirrors
shine.  The white marble toilet is topped with a soft pink fuzzy cover
and the sweet air is circulated wonderfully in this well kept
facility.  {X

20212.name: {RF{rl{Ya{rm{Re {RH{Ya{rl{Rl{x
description: {RStanding at the entrance of what seems to be a high tower one can
feel great heat coming from inside, a rather pleasant change from the
cold air of Polaris.  A huge golem-like being shaped entirely of
burning flames stands at guard of the tower.  {x

20227.name: {rC{Ra{Yfeter{Ri{ra{x
description: {RMmmmm,...  There is a {Ywonderfully sp{Ricy scent in the air.  The
smell of hot, tasty food {Yattracts your{R attention.  A lady, in the far
corner of the Cafeteria, {Yis bent over{R a stove looking into the oven
door.  A large table and {Ya few booths{R litter the Cafe.  {x

20213.name: {rH{Ra{Yllw{Ra{ry{x
description: {RThis end of the flaming hallway leads to the lounge to the south
and the Ordinance office to the north.  The lavatories are far east
and and the staircase leading to the hangars nearby to the east.  {x

20233.name: {*Lost in Darkness{x
description: {&This is the portal room of the Flame Faction.  Used as a quicker
way around the realms.  Noone outside of Flame knows of this place.  {x
{MEast  {*- Castle Black
{1South {*- Myth Drannor
{mWest  {*- City of Candlekeep
{#Up    {*- Drakyri Isle
{3Down  {*- Market Square{x

20228.name: {BP{Wol{Ca{Wri{Bs {RB{rank {rO{Rf{Yfi{Rc{re{x
description: {BA cool breeze hits you as you pass through the door, into the Bank
Office.  The iced over {wsurfaces of the tables and counters gleam an
almost eerie light.  There is a short, {Wchubby man in the corner
dressed in the common robes of a banker.  It seems {byou should take
your time here, the floors look of ice and appear to be quite
slippery.  {x

20206.name: {rH{Ra{Yng{Ra{rr {BWay{x
description: {YWest: Hangars 1, 2, 3 and 4 {B|{Y North: Hangar 5

Here stands a goofy lookin person, a number of piercings in his
face.  He's wearing a shirt that says "Give me all your Money, Fool!" 
Should you really trust him with your cash?
20202.room_name: {BThe P{Wol{Ca{Wri{Bs {RB{ra{Ynk{re{Rr{x stands here, handling deposits and withdrawls

20207.name: {RA {-Sexy {rF{Ri{Yr{re {RN{Yy{rm{Rp{Yh{X~

{RA ball of fire floats a few inches off the ground.  A good look
inside and you can see the faint body of a being.  {x

20208.name: {RA {-F{-u{-n{-k{-y {RF{ri{Yr{Re{rf{Yl{Ry{X~
description:
{RA small glimmering ball of fire folds in on itself.  Upon closer
inspection, you see a small bug, resembling a fire fly, floating
inside the ball of billowing fire.  Radiating from within the depths
of flame can be seen the emblem of the Flame Faction.  {X

20209.name: {RP{ryroki{X~
description:
{RHere stands an {-amazing{R looking creature.  Long {*black{R hair and eyes
that glint an amazing {ggreen{R.  Her lips, the color of {rS{Re{Wx{R, lined in
{rf{Ri{yr{Ye{R and kissed with the flames of {*H{well{R.  Her body crafted like the
lines of a million {Wdi{wa{Wmo{Bn{Wds{R, draped in {Gemerald{R clothes as it were
{yhoney{R poured over a soft tender {-bread{R.  Her wings wrap around her as
if she were a {Wpearl{R, and they, the clam shell.  {X

20210.name: {RA {YS{rm{Ro{Yl{rd{Re{Yr{ri{Rn{Yg {RS{Ya{Rl{Ya{rma{Yn{Rd{Ye{Rr{X~
description:
{RHard red scales line this beast.  It appears almost as a large
lizard, except for all the spines on its body.  {X {R It is aptly fitted
with a collar and a leash, so that its master can walk it around.  {X
20210.room_name: {RA {Ygl{Ro{rw{Ri{Yng {rs{Rc{Ya{Rl{ry {Rsalamander is here, awaiting its masters commands.{X
